comment._content: This is an unique photo. This photo shows how far we have come in the equipment and uniforms for football since the 1900s. Also, it shows us how tough football has become through the years.

comment._content: A report on Harvard sports a little later than this has reports on football at books.google.com/books?id=YluWJIchpVEC&pg=PA76&lp... McKinlock Jr. '16 For Coolidge there are two possibilities: T. J. Coolidge, 3rd '15 C. A. Coolidge '17
